briefTitle: An Observational Study of Avastin (Bevacizumab) in Patients With Metastatic Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Avastin in First Line Metastatic or Recurrent Breast Cancer. Retrospective Phase IV Study
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients with metastatic breast cancer in first line treatment who have completed treatment with Avastin

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients not willing or unable to signed written consent form
